attributes.description: Count of reflections with proposed changes over time
attributes.title: Proposed changes over time
attributes.visState: {"title": "Proposed changes over time", "type": "line", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "date_histogram", "schema": "segment", "params": {"field": "timestamp", "interval": "auto", "min_doc_count": 1}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right"}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Category split from proposed change text using filter buckets
attributes.title: Top improvement categories
attributes.visState: {"title": "Top improvement categories", "type": "pie", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "filters", "schema": "segment", "params": {"filters": [{"input": {"query": "proposed_change.what:*threshold* OR proposed_change.why:*threshold*"}, "label": "Thresholds"}, {"input": {"query": "proposed_change.what:*memory* OR proposed_change.why:*memory*"}, "label": "Memory"}, {"input": {"query": "proposed_change.what:*tool* OR proposed_change.why:*tool*"}, "label": "Tooling"}, {"input": {"query": "proposed_change.what:*telemetry* OR proposed_change.why:*telemetry*"}, "label": "Telemetry"}]}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "isDonut": false, "legendPosition": "right"}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.title: Impact assessment distribution
attributes.visState: {"title": "Impact assessment distribution", "type": "pie", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "filters", "schema": "segment", "params": {"filters": [{"input": {"query": "impact_assessment:*high*"}, "label": "High"}, {"input": {"query": "impact_assessment:*medium*"}, "label": "Medium"}, {"input": {"query": "impact_assessment:*low*"}, "label": "Low"}]}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "isDonut": true, "legendPosition": "right"}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Trend lines for proposal/impact/metrics presence in reflections
attributes.title: Reflection metrics trending
attributes.visState: {"title": "Reflection metrics trending", "type": "line", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "schema": "metric", "params": {}}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "date_histogram", "schema": "segment", "params": {"field": "timestamp", "interval": "auto", "min_doc_count": 1}}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "filters", "schema": "group", "params": {"filters": [{"input": {"query": "proposed_change.what:*"}, "label": "Has proposed change"}, {"input": {"query": "impact_assessment:*"}, "label": "Has impact assessment"}, {"input": {"query": "supporting_metrics:*"}, "label": "Has supporting metrics"}]}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right"}, "listeners": {}}

attributes.description: Proposed changes over time, top improvement categories, impact distribution, metrics trending.
attributes.title: Reflection Insights
